content.prompt: Directions: You will hear a series of brief conversations between two speakers. Each exchange will be spoken twice. You are to select, from the four choices, the reply that the first speaker would be most likely to make to the remark of the second speaker.

choices.label: Ne t’en fais pas. nous avons un pneu de rechange.
Aucun problème, j'ai été toujours champion du cent mètres.
Tu as raison, il vaudrait mieux recycler les bouteilles.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Affect the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
